amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to establish a new voluntary national counter-cyclical income support program for dairy producers. \ As amended by the Vitter amendment (A037) the limit on pounds of milk per month was increased from 230,000 pounds to 500,000 pounds. \ As amended by the Obey amendment (A038) language concerning the payments from processors to the trust fund was modified.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 47 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section providing a national counter-cyclical income support program for dairy producers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A036) as amended Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 224 (Roll no. 368).
